Express.js is ...............

http://mywebsite.com/API

RESOURCES:
-talks
    http://mywebsite.com/api/talks
-attendees
    http://mywebsite.com/api/attendees

ACTIONS:
-add a talk (POST)
    http://mywebsite.com/api/talks/
-add an attendee (POST)
    http://mywebsite.com/api/attendees/
-add an attendee to list of talk (PUT)
    http://mywebsite.com/api/talks/[TALK_ID]/attendees/[ATTENDEES_ID]
-remove an attendee from a talk (DELETE)
    http://mywebsite.com/api/talks/[TALK_ID]/attendees/[ATTENDEES_ID]

API TESTING
